choiceBouquet.text: In the catalog choose a bouquet that you like.

choiceSize.text: On the page with the bouquet description choose the appropriate size. Add a flower, candy, or any other gift to the bouquet.

enterShippingDetails.text: Fill in the shipping form and pay for the order in a convenient way.

BouquetReady.text: The bouquet will be collected from the freshest flowers and delivered to the recipient at the specified time.
